name: css-hyphens
description: Css module of single purpose classes for hyphens

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-hyphens.css > css/css-hyphens.css && tachyons src/css-hyphens.css --minify > css/css-hyphens.min.css && tachyons src/css-hyphens.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
